name: Classic Solitaires
description:
Softick Classic Solitaires is an iPad/iPhone native version of the famous card games, specially designed and optimized for multitouch screen, introduces large readable cards precisely hit by human fingers.

Feel the difference! We really worked hard to give you hours of exciting game. Softick Classic Solitaires is smart enough to catch the meaning of every your gesture, helping you to focus on the game and not on the control.

Features
* Klondike Solitaire (Windows Solitaire), FreeCell and Yukon games in a single application
* Special iPad version comes with high resolution graphics
* Large and eye-friendly card set, optimized for fingers and long play
* Various game types with additional Vegas game
* Deal 1, 2, 3 or even 4 cards at a time
* Intuitive cards dragging system
* Optional timed game, scoring, ​and statistics
* Unlimited undo
* Automatic cards turnover and other helpful time-saving assistance
* Customizable table background
* Saves your game on exit, power loss, incoming call or SMS
* Game Center support
